maml:description.maml:para: Use to retrieve incident type projections based on filter. The filter is built using provided parameters.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Use the id of the incident to locate it.
Returns all incidents that has a title starting with "Network", a status "Active" and hasn't been modified for the last two days.

maml:description.maml:para: Used to create new incidents based in given parameters. Default values: ServerName = "localhost" Status = "Active"

command:example.maml:title: -------------- Example 1 --------------
command:example.dev:code: New-SCSMIncident -Title "Network issue" -Description "User cannot reach his home folder" -Impact Low -Urgency High -Classification "Networking" -Source Email

dev:remarks.maml:para: Registers a new incident with given property values.

command:example.maml:title: -------------- Example 2 --------------
command:example.dev:code: New-SCSMIncident -Title "Network issue" -Description "User cannot reach his home folder" -Impact Low -Urgency High -Classification "Networking" -Source Email -AffectedUser "domain\user" -Status "Closed"

maml:description.maml:para: Used to update incidents, only passed properties will be updated.

command:example.maml:title: -------------- Example 1 --------------
command:example.dev:code: Set-SCSMIncident -ID IR33 -Comment "User still not reaching his home folder"

dev:remarks.maml:para: Adds an analyst comment to the incident with an id matching IR33.

This command will locate all incidents that has a title that starts with "Network" and a status of "Active". After locating the incidents they will be updated with an urgency "High" and then a file will be added to the "Attached Files" section of each incident.
